channel.title: Palantir Army Contract Deployment
channel.description: Will Palantir's $10B Army contract deliver first deployment by Q2 2026?

item.title: Will Palantir's $10B Army contract deliver first deployment by Q2 2026?
item.description: Palantir secured landmark $10 billion U.S. Army contract on July 31, 2025, cementing its role as military tech titan. Market resolves YES if first major deployment occurs by June 30, 2026 under this contract.

resolution.rules: Market resolves YES if Palantir or U.S. Army announces the first operational deployment of systems under the $10B July 2025 contract by June 30, 2026. Major deployment defined as serving 1,000+ military personnel or supporting active combat/intelligence operations. Resolution requires official Department of Defense or Palantir announcements.
